== Members ==

This page contains the current list of members of the DelhiTeam -- The Ubuntu Delhi usergroup. Looking for a Lo``Co team? Join the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~indian-team|Ubuntu Indian Local Community]]</nowiki>.

=== New Members ===
If you are a Ubuntu user residing in Delhi, you may join this DelhiTeam by adding your name at the end of the member list below. Ex-residents of Delhi and NCR are also welcome.

=== Recommended associations ===
You are recommended to register at <nowiki>[[http://www.launchpad.net|Launchpad]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org|UbuntuForums]]</nowiki>. Be an active part of Ubuntu Linux and contribute as much as you can. Volunteer projects at launchpad, make subgroups and get your projects registered. Submit whichever bugs you discover at Launchpad. 
If you have an innovative brain, submit new ideas at <nowiki>[[http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com|UbuntuBrainstorm]]</nowiki>. Share the spirit of Ubuntu!

=== Code of conduct ===
You should abide by the Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct|CodeOfConduct]]</nowiki>. Be an Ubuntero and stand for Ubuntu.

== Member List ==
Please keep the following list sorted in alphabetical order. If you don't have a Wiki page, please create one with a brief introduction of yours.
